data.name: plEmailNotification.Help
data.value: Check to send email notifications to the users in the Content Approvers role when there is content waiting for approval.

data.name: plAdministratorRole.Text
data.value: Administrator Role:

data.name: plAdministratorRole.Help
data.value: Choose a role for the Engage Publish administrator. Administrators can create and approve content.

data.name: plAuthorRole.Text
data.value: Authors Role:

data.name: plAuthorRole.Help
data.value: Choose a role for the Engage Publish authors. Authors can create content, but not approve.

data.name: plSecurity.Text
data.value: Enable Security:

data.name: plSecurity.Help
data.value: Turn on role authorization so that categories can be restricted by registered user roles. If you've already setup categories and then enable security you will have to add role information to EACH category you've already added.

data.name: plEmailNotificationRole.Text
data.value: Approval Notification Role:

data.name: plEmailNotificationRole.Help
data.value: The role that will be emailed when a request for approval is made. This can be different than the Administrators Role, or can be set to the same role as admin.

data.name: FirstTime.Text
data.value:
You'll need to configure some of the Engage: Publish options below in order to proceed
For more information about Engage: Publish visit EngageSoftare.com.

data.name: lnkUpdate.Text
data.value: Save Settings

data.name: lblMailNotConfigured.Text
data.value: SMTP does not appear to be configured. You must configure your SMTP settings in order to enable Email a Friend and Approval Notification functionality. For help with this click here

data.name: cvEmailNotification.Text
data.value: You cannot enable email notifications if SMTP settings are not configured.

data.name: cvMaximumRating.Text
data.value: Value must be an integer

data.name: plCommentAnonymous.Help
data.value: Check to allow all users to post comments about articles. If unchecked, only authenticated users can post comments.

data.name: plCommentAnonymous.Text
data.value: Allow comments from unauthenticated users:

data.name: plCommentApproval.Help
data.value: If checked, all comments must be moderated under the Moderation menu. Otherwise, all comments will appear on the site immediately after they have been submitted. Comment moderation can only be done by users in the Publish Administrator role.

data.name: plCommentApproval.Text
data.value: Require comments to be approved:

data.name: plCommentAutoApprove.Help
data.value: Check if you only want to moderate comments from unauthenticated users.

data.name: plCommentAutoApprove.Text
data.value: Automatically approve comments from authenticated users:

data.name: plEnableComments.Help
data.value: Check to allow users to comment on articles. If checked, you can turn comments off for specific Article Display modules, if necessary.

data.name: plEnableComments.Text
data.value: Enable comments:

data.name: plEnableRatings.Help
data.value: Check to allow articles to be rated. You can turn off ratings on specific Article Display modules, if necessary.

data.name: plEnableRatings.Text
data.value: Enable ratings:

data.name: plMaximumRating.Help
data.value: This is an integer value indicating the highest rating that an article can receive, defining the rating scale. This value should not be changed after initial setup, as all previous ratings will no longer be represented correctly.

data.name: plMaximumRating.Text
data.value: Maximum rating:

data.name: plAnonymousRatings.Help
data.value: Check to allow all users to rate articles. If unchecked, only authenticated users can rate articles.

data.name: plAnonymousRatings.Text
data.value: Allow ratings from unauthenticated users:

data.name: lblAuthorCategoryEdit.Help
data.value: If you would like the abillity for Authors to edit Categories uncheck this box.

data.name: lblAuthorCategoryEdit.Text
data.value: Allow Author Category Edit

data.name: plEnableVenexus.Help
data.value: Checking this will allow your Publish content to be populated into the Venexus Search tables properly. This happens during the standard DNN search indexing process.

data.name: plEnableVenexus.Text
data.value: Enable Venexus Search Integration:

data.name: plEnableViewTracking.Help
data.value: If you would like to track the number of times articles and categories are viewed check this box.

data.name: plEnableViewTracking.Text
data.value: Track Article/Category Views:

data.name: plEnablePublishFriendlyUrls.Help
data.value: If checked, links using ItemLink.aspx will resolve to a url like http://hostname/tabid/##/itemid/##/Title-Of-Article.aspx. Otherwise, standard DNN urls will be used.

data.name: plEnablePublishFriendlyUrls.Text
data.value: Enable Publish Friendly Urls:

data.name: lblFriendlyUrlsNotOn.Text
data.value: The Publish Friendly Url feature requires DotNetNuke Friendly Urls to be turned on. Your hosting provider may do so in the Host Settings menu, under Advanced Settings.

data.name: plEnableDisplayNameAsHyperlink.Text
data.value: Display option of whether to show an item title as a hyperlink in lists:

data.name: plEnableDisplayNameAsHyperlink.Help
data.value: When checked, a new option appears when editting items. This option, Display Name as Hyperlink, allows authors to decide whether they want articles or categories to be links or not when displayed in lists.

data.name: plAllowRichTextDescriptions.Help
data.value: If checked, users can choose to use a Rich-Text editor when editing item descriptions.

data.name: plAllowRichTextDescriptions.Text
data.value: Allow Rich-Text Descriptions for Items:

data.name: plUseApprovals.Help
data.value: If checked, items submitted by Authors have to be approved by Administrators. This also enabled the Edit status, for Administrators to save changes without automatically pushing the changes live. If unchecked, all changes will always be pushed live immediately.

data.name: plUseApprovals.Text
data.value: Use Approvals:

data.name: plShowItemId.Help
data.value: When checked, an item's ID will be displayed when editing the item, otherwise it will be hidden.

data.name: plShowItemId.Text
data.value: Show Item ID When Editing an Item:

data.name: plUseEmbeddedArticles.Help
data.value: When checked, there will be an option when editing an article to embed another article within the article's display. If unchecked, this option is not available.

data.name: plUseEmbeddedArticles.Text
data.value: Use Embedded Articles:

data.name: plThumbnailSubdirectory.Help
data.value: This is the name of the subdirectory in your portal that you want uploaded Publish Thumbnails to be saved in.

data.name: plThumbnailSubdirectory.Text
data.value: Thumbnail Subdirectory Name (only used with the PublishSelection option above):

data.name: ChooseOne.Text
data.value: Choose One

data.name: plDefaultDisplayPage.Help
data.value: This is a DNN page with Engage: Publish on the page, the module must be marked as overrideable. It will be the page to display articles who are orphaned, those that don't have display pages setup properly.

data.name: plDefaultDisplayPage.Text
data.value: Default Display Page:

data.name: plEmailNotification.Text
data.value: Send Email Notifications:

data.name: plArticleComments.Help
data.value: Each article can be configured individually to display or not display the Comments functionality, this is the default setting.

data.name: plArticleComments.Text
data.value: Comments Displayed By Default:

data.name: plArticleRatings.Help
data.value: Each article can be configured individually to display or not display the Ratings functionality, this is the default setting.

data.name: plArticleRatings.Text
data.value: Ratings Displayed By Default:

data.name: plEnableEmailAFriend.Help
data.value: Each article can be configured individually to display or not display the Email A Friend link, this is the default setting.

data.name: plEnableEmailAFriend.Text
data.value: Email A Friend Displayed By Default:

data.name: plPrinterFriendly.Help
data.value: Each article can be configured individually to display or not display the Printer Friendly link, this is the default setting.

data.name: plPrinterFriendly.Text
data.value: Printer Friendly Displayed By Default:

data.name: plReturnToList.Help
data.value: Each article can display a "Return to List" link that will take the reader back to the category list for this item.

data.name: plReturnToList.Text
data.value: Return to List Displayed By Default:

data.name: plReturnToListSession.Help
data.value: Use of session is not recommended, but if you do enable this users who click on an article from a list, and then navigate to other articles will always link back to the last list they viewed with the "Return To List" functionality

data.name: plReturnToListSession.Text
data.value: Enable Session storage for the Return To List Link

data.name: lblAdminEdit.Text
data.value: Admin Edit Settings

data.name: lblArticleEditDefaults.Text
data.value: Article Edit Defaults

data.name: lblDefaultSettings.Text
data.value: Default Settings

data.name: lblDisplayFunctionality.Text
data.value: Display Functionality

data.name: lblRolesAndPermissions.Text
data.value: Roles and Permissions

data.name: plEnablePaging.Help
data.value: If enabled you can insert [PAGE] in your article text and Publish will treat these as page breaks.

data.name: plEnablePaging.Text
data.value: Enable Article Paging Functionality:

data.name: plEnableSimpleGallery.Help
data.value: If you have the Ventrian SimpleGallery module installed, this option is available to link your articles to a SimpleGallery album, and have thumbnails from that album display when the article is displayed.

data.name: plEnableSimpleGallery.Text
data.value: Enable SimpleGallery Integration:

data.name: plEnableUltraMediaGallery.Help
data.value: If you have the BizModules Ultra Media Gallery installed, this option is available to link your articles to an Ultra Media Gallery album, and have thumbnails from that album display when the article is displayed.

data.name: plEnableUltraMediaGallery.Text
data.value: Enable Ultra Media Gallery Integration:

data.name: DotNetNuke.Text
data.value: DotNetNuke File Selection

data.name: EngagePublish.Text
data.value: Engage: Publish File Selection

data.name: plThumbnailSelection.Help
data.value: Choose which interface to use when adding a thumbnail to an article or category. The DotNetNuke file selection is the same that is used by the DotNetNuke administrative screens. The Engage: Publish file selection simplifies the upload and selection experience by restricting uploads to one folder (configured below).

data.name: plThumbnailSelection.Text
data.value: Thumbnail Selection Option:

data.name: plDefaultCacheTime.Help
data.value: The default cache time Publish modules will use for displaying information. You can override this setting at the module level.

data.name: plDefaultCacheTime.Text
data.value: Default Publish Cache Time

data.name: rvDefaultCacheTime.Text
data.value: Please enter a valid Integer from 0 to 1000

data.name: plItemDescriptionHeight.Help
data.value: You can control the height of the description field on the item edit screens. Please choose a height in Pixels here.

data.name: plItemDescriptionHeight.Text
data.value: Item Description Height:

data.name: plItemDescriptionWidth.Help
data.value: You can control the width of the description field on the item edit screens. Please choose a width in Pixels here.

data.name: plItemDescriptionWidth.Text
data.value: Item Description Width:

data.name: plArticleTextHeight.Help
data.value: You can control the height of the article text field on the article edit screen. Please choose a height in Pixels here.

data.name: plArticleTextHeight.Text
data.value: Article Text Editor Height:

data.name: plArticleTextWidth.Help
data.value: You can control the width of the article text field on the article edit screen. Please choose a width in Pixels here.

data.name: plArticleTextWidth.Text
data.value: Article Text Editor Width:

data.name: rvArticleTextHeight.Text
data.value: Please enter a valid Integer from 50 to 10000

data.name: rvArticleTextWidth.Text
data.value: Please enter a valid Integer from 50 to 10000

data.name: rvItemDescriptionHeight.Text
data.value: Please enter a valid Integer from 50 to 10000

data.name: rvItemDescriptionWidth.Text
data.value: Please enter a valid Integer from 50 to 10000

data.name: rfvDefaultDisplayPage.Text
data.value: Please choose a default display page.

data.name: lblServiceUrlHelp.Help
data.value: The Web Service URL to get specific content from this Portal. The above key will be required to access the service.

data.name: lblAuthorizationKeyHelp.Help
data.value: Auto-generated authorization key for this instance of Publish.

data.name: lblSyndicationSettings.Text
data.value: Syndication Settings

data.name: lblPublisherSyndicationSettings.Text
data.value: Content Server Information

data.name: lblPublisherSyndication.Text
data.value: Displayed here is the Authorization Key and URL for subscriber instances of Publish. This information will be required for configuration of subscribers.

data.name: lblAuthorizationKeyHelp.Text
data.value: Authorization Key

data.name: lblServiceUrlHelp.Text
data.value: Web Service URL

data.name: lblSubscriberSyndicationSettings.Text
data.value: Subscriber Configuration

data.name: lblSubscriberSyndication.Text
data.value: To configure this module as a Subscriber to Publish content enter the Authorization Key and URL.

data.name: lblSubscriberServiceUrl.Help
data.value: Contact the Site Administrator for the correct URL to receive content.

data.name: lblSubscriberAuthorizationKey.Help
data.value: Contact the Site Administrator for the Authorization Key and URL for the portal in which you want to subscribe to content.

data.name: lblArchiveContent.Help
data.value: In cases where content is archived on the publishing site, you can decide to archive your copy of the content.

data.name: lblArchiveContent.Text
data.value: Archive my content locally if not found on publishing site.

data.name: lblApproveContent.Help
data.value: By default all content you recieve is Pending Approval and emails are automatically generated. Check to automatically approve all content.

data.name: lblApproveContent.Text
data.value: Automatically approve content.

data.name: plShowAuthor.Text
data.value: Author Displayed by Default:

data.name: plEnableTags.Help
data.value: If enabled tagging functionality will be used within Publish. Tags allow you to assign keywords to specific articles in Publish, used for organization purposes, in addition to or instead of Categories. Currently tagging is only implemented in the admin view so that you can start tagging items now. In a future release we will have the front end support for tagging implemented

data.name: plEnableTags.Text
data.value: Enable Tagging:

data.name: plTagList.Help
data.value: Choose the page that should be the default page for Tag Links. The page needs to have a Tag Cloud module setup on it before it will show up in this list.

data.name: plTagList.Text
data.value: Default page for the Tag Cloud

data.name: plShowTags.Text
data.value: Show Tags by Default:

data.name: plShowAuthor.Help
data.value: Check the show Author option by default when editing an article.

data.name: plShowTags.Help
data.value: Check the show Tags option by default when editing an article.

data.name: lblPingServices.Text
data.value: Ping Settings

data.name: lblEnablePing.Help
data.value: Pinging services use XML-RPC calls to services like Technorati and Blogsearch.google.com to tell them when a website has changed.

data.name: lblEnablePing.Text
data.value: Enable Ping Services:

data.name: lblPingServers.Help
data.value: List of Ping Servers to use when enabled. Put each Server on a new line by pressing Shift-Enter

data.name: lblPingServers.Text
data.value: Ping Servers:

data.name: lblChangedPage.Help
data.value: Ping Servers take a parameter for the page that has changed when a new article is posted. If you have a main articles page that lists off all recent posts use that URL here. If not Publish will just default to the TabID you are currently editing.

data.name: lblChangedPage.Text
data.value: Changed URL:

data.name: DefaultPingServers.Text
data.value: http://rpc.technorati.com/rpc/ping http://rpc.pingomatic.com http://blogsearch.google.com/ping/RPC2

data.name: ActiveForumsCommentType.Text
data.value: Active Forums Comments

data.name: lblCommentsType.Help
data.value: Choose whether you would like to use the standard Publish method of entering and displaying comments, or whether you would like to integrate with a forum module for article comments.

data.name: lblCommentsType.Text
data.value: Comments Type:

data.name: PublishCommentType.Text
data.value: Publish Comments

data.name: lblCommunityServices.Text
data.value: Community Services

data.value: Admin Edit Settings (click to collapse)

data.name: plCommentNotification.Help
data.value: If enabled, article authors will receive an email notification when a new comment is posted to an article.

data.name: plCommentNotification.Text
data.value: Comment Notification:

data.name: plUseShortPublishLinks.Help
data.value:
Enabling Publish shortened links will link articles and categories through a link like http://www.mydomainname.com/itemlink.aspx?itemid=## instead of http://www.mydomain.com/desktopmodules/engagepublish/itemlink.aspx?itemid=##
To do this you must make changes to your siteurls.config file.

data.name: plUseShortPublishLinks.Text
data.value: Enable Publish shortened links (see help):

data.name: clpAddOns.CollapsedText
data.value: Module AddOns (click to expand)

data.name: clpAddOns.ExpandedText
data.value: Module AddOns (click to collapse)

data.name: plAdminPagingSize.Help
data.value: Choose how many items to display per page on the administration lists for Publish, this is the default value.

data.name: plAdminPagingSize.Text
data.value: Admin List Paging Size

data.name: rvAdminPagingSize.Text
data.value: Please enter a valid Integer from 1 to 1000

data.name: plDefaultTextHtmlCategory.Help
data.value: Please choose a default category for content saved with the Publish Text/HTML module.

data.name: plDefaultTextHtmlCategory.Text
data.value: Default category for Publish Text/HTML module.

data.name: plDefaultRichTextDescriptions.Help
data.value: If Rich-Text descriptions are enabled you can default the descriptions to rich text.

data.name: plDefaultRichTextDescriptions.Text
data.value: Default to Rich-Text Descriptions

data.value: Default Category for posts using Windows Live Writer that get submitted without a category.
